text.text: How can I access the mileage rounding settings for facilities?

text: To access the mileage rounding settings for facilities, you can click the "Facilities" tab on the navigation bar and then click the "Mileage" tab. You can then click the "Settings" section and select the desired mileage rounding option.

text.text: Where do I find the option to configure mileage rounding for a specific facility?

text: To configure mileage rounding for a specific facility, you can click the "Facilities" tab on the navigation bar and then click the "Mileage" tab. You can then click the "Settings" section and select the desired mileage rounding option.

text.text: What tab do I need to navigate to in order to adjust mileage rounding settings?

text: To adjust mileage rounding settings, you can click the "Settings" tab on the navigation bar and then click the "Configuration" tab. You can then scroll down to the "Patient billing" heading and click the "Mileage rounding" field. You can then select an option from the list.

text.text: What are the available options for mileage rounding?

text: The available options for mileage rounding are:. Do not round (fractional). Round down .5. Round down always. Round up.5. Round up always. You can also select an option from the list. You can also select an option from the list.

text.text: How do I select the desired mileage rounding option for a facility?

text: To select the desired mileage rounding option for a facility, you can click the "edit icon" associated with the "Settings" section. You can then select one of the following options: Do not round (fractional) Round down .5 Round down always Round up.5 Round up always

text.text: Can I choose not to round mileage at all?

text: Yes, you can choose to not round mileage at all by selecting the "Do not round (fractional)" option.

text.text: What does it mean to round down .5 for mileage?

text: When you round down .5 for mileage, you are rounding the mileage to the nearest whole number. This means that if the mileage is 1.5 miles, it will be rounded down to 1 mile.

text.text: When would I choose to round down always for mileage?

text: You can choose to round down always for mileage if you want to round the mileage to the nearest whole number. This means that if the mileage is 1.5 miles, it will be rounded down to 1 mile.

text.text: Is there an option to round up .5 for mileage?

text: Yes, you can choose to round up .5 for mileage if you want to round the mileage to the nearest whole number. This means that if the mileage is 1.5 miles, it will be rounded up to 2 miles.

text.text: In what scenario would I select the option to round up always for mileage?

text: You can choose to round up always for mileage if you want to round the mileage to the nearest whole number. This means that if the mileage is 1.5 miles, it will be rounded up to 2 miles.

text.text: After selecting a mileage rounding option, how do I save the changes?

text: To save the changes, you can click "Save changes".

text.text: Where can I verify the mileage rounding setting for a facility after saving changes?

text: The mileage rounding setting for a facility will be displayed under the Settings heading after you click "Save changes".

text.text: Can I modify the mileage rounding setting for a facility later if needed?

text: Yes, you can modify the mileage rounding setting for a facility later if needed. To modify an existing policy or plan, you can click the Mileage rounding field and then select to round up/down or use fractional mileage. You can also click Save & Close.

text.text: What considerations should I keep in mind when choosing a mileage rounding option?

text: You can choose to round mileage up, down, or use fractional mileage to accommodate payer requirements. You can also choose to not round mileage at all.

text.text: How does mileage rounding affect the accuracy of billing for facility transportation?

text: To set mileage rounding for patients who are primary or self-pay payers, you can click the Mileage rounding field and then select an option from the list. You can also click Save.

text.text: What impact does mileage rounding have on billing processes and reimbursement?

text: If you delete a plan that has been applied to an open claim, the system will still process the claim normally but you will not be able to add this plan to new claims.

text.text: Are there any limitations or restrictions associated with mileage rounding settings for facilities?

text: To set mileage rounding for patients who are primary or self-pay payers, you can click the Mileage rounding field and then select an option from the list. You can also click Save.

text: To accommodate payer requirements, you can choose to round mileage up, down, or use fractional mileage.
